alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 06 at 2:42PM MDT until April 07 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and areas of blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Portions of east central South Dakota and southwest Minnesota. This includes the tribal lands of the Flandreau Santee Sioux Tribal Nation. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slushy or slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute on Thursday. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
